thread.title: Amal and George Clooney Expecting Twins - Funniest Twitter Reactions to Clooney Baby News
thread.title_full: Amal and George Clooney Expecting Twins - Funniest Twitter Reactions to Clooney Baby News

author: Megan Friedman
title: Amal and George Clooney Expecting Twins - Funniest Twitter Reactions to Clooney Baby News
text:
On Thursday, The Talk host Julie Chen broke the news that George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins. The actor and the human-rights lawyer will welcome their first children in June. As soon as the news broke, Twitter had a million opinions—and comparisons to Beyoncé and Jay Z's twins, of course. (Those four kids are going to save the world.) Take a look at some of the funniest Twitter reactions to the happy news:
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
BREAKING NEWS: International law and human rights lawyer, Amal Clooney, is expecting twins with her actor-husband.
— Quinn Sutherland (@ReelQuinn) February 9, 2017
